title: Manifest file for 'my-launcher'
description: A schema for the 'my-launcher.json' manifest file, which describes requirements for launching programs using the 'my-launcher' tool.

program_type.description: Type of program being launched (currently only supports Java)

entrypoint.description: Path to the program entrypoint. For Java programs, this is the name of the class containing the 'public static void main' method

dry_run.description: If true, the command will be printed instead of executed

classpath.description: List of classpath entries. This must at least include the entrypoint class. In many cases, this will also include the program's dependencies

system_properties.description: Optional system properties to be set
